nodes.name: Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023
nodes.description: Comprehensive framework for processing digital personal data in India
Definitions and scope of applicability
nodes.title: Preliminary

nodes.description: Core responsibilities including consent, notice, and data handling
nodes.title: Obligations of Data Fiduciary

nodes.description: Rights to access, correction, erasure, and grievance redressal
nodes.title: Rights and Duties of Data Principal

nodes.description: Exemptions for state security, research, and startups
nodes.title: Special Provisions

nodes.description: Establishment, composition, and powers of the Board
nodes.title: Data Protection Board of India

nodes.description: Inquiry, penalty imposition, and direction issuance
nodes.title: Powers and Functions of Board

nodes.description: Appellate Tribunal procedures and mediation options
nodes.title: Appeal and Alternative Dispute Resolution

nodes.description: Schedule of penalties for non-compliance
nodes.title: Penalties and Adjudication

nodes.description: Power to make rules, amendments, and override effect
nodes.title: Miscellaneous
Right to correction of personal data
Right to erasure of personal data
Processor to be bound by contract
Personal data of other vulnerable persons
Penalties for failure to protect personal data

nodes.text: Notice must include purpose of processing
Notice must identify fiduciary and processor
Process only personal data that is necessary
Do not process without legal basis
Retain data only as long as necessary
Respond to access requests within 30 days
Data principal responsible for their actions
Transfer data only with fiduciary approval
Do not use children for profiling

nodes.name: Data Fiduciary
nodes.description: Entity determining purposes and means of processing personal data

nodes.name: Significant Data Fiduciary
nodes.description: Large-scale data processors with enhanced obligations

nodes.name: Data Processor
nodes.description: Entity processing personal data on behalf of fiduciary

nodes.name: Data Principal
nodes.description: Individual to whom personal data relates

nodes.name: Consent Manager
nodes.description: Facilitates collection and management of consent

nodes.name: Data Protection Officer
nodes.description: Appointed by SDFs for compliance oversight

nodes.name: Data Protection Authority
nodes.description: Regulatory and enforcement body under DPDPA

nodes.name: Personal Identifiable Information
nodes.description: Name, email, phone, address

nodes.name: Sensitive Personal Data
nodes.description: Biometric, genetic, financial, health data

nodes.name: Data of Children
nodes.description: Personal data of persons under 18 years

nodes.name: Data of Vulnerable Persons
nodes.description: Data of disabled or vulnerable individuals

nodes.name: Location/Tracking Data
nodes.description: GPS, movement tracking information

nodes.name: Communication Data
nodes.description: Emails, messages, call logs

nodes.name: Transaction Data
nodes.description: Payment and transaction information

nodes.name: Device Data
nodes.description: Device IDs, IP addresses, cookies

nodes.name: Behavioral Data
nodes.description: Browsing history, preferences, interactions

nodes.name: Demographic Data
nodes.description: Age, gender, ethnicity, religion

nodes.name: Encryption
nodes.description: Encrypt personal data in transit and at rest

nodes.name: Access Controls
nodes.description: Restrict access to authorized personnel only

nodes.name: Authentication
nodes.description: Multi-factor authentication and strong passwords

nodes.name: Audit Logs
nodes.description: Maintain logs of all data access and modifications

nodes.name: Data Backup
nodes.description: Regular backups with secure storage

nodes.name: Employee Training
nodes.description: Data protection and privacy training programs

nodes.name: Data Protection Policy
nodes.description: Written data protection and processing policy

nodes.name: Breach Notification
nodes.description: Notify authority and principals of breaches

nodes.name: Consent Management
nodes.description: Manage and track consent for processing

nodes.name: Retention Limits
nodes.description: Delete data when retention purpose is met

nodes.name: DPIA Requirement
nodes.description: Conduct Data Protection Impact Assessment

nodes.name: Grievance Mechanism
nodes.description: Establish grievance redressal system

nodes.name: Personal Data Breach
nodes.description: Unauthorized access or disclosure of personal data

nodes.name: Consent Withdrawal
nodes.description: Data principal withdraws consent for processing

nodes.name: Grievance Raised
nodes.description: Data principal raises grievance against fiduciary

nodes.name: Data Access Request
nodes.description: Data principal requests access to personal data

nodes.name: Erasure Request
nodes.description: Data principal requests erasure of personal data

nodes.name: Correction Request
nodes.description: Data principal requests correction of inaccurate data

nodes.name: Authority Inquiry
nodes.description: DPDPA Authority initiates investigation or inquiry

nodes.name: Data Transfer
nodes.description: Transfer of personal data to third party

nodes.name: Compliance Audit
nodes.description: Audit of compliance with DPDPA obligations

nodes.name: Sanction/Penalty
nodes.description: Authority issues penalty or sanction

nodes.name: Data Protection Policy
nodes.description: Primary policy for data protection governance

nodes.name: Breach Notification Policy
nodes.description: Procedures for notifying breach incidents

nodes.name: Consent Management Policy
nodes.description: Framework for managing consent collection and withdrawal

nodes.name: Data Transfer Policy
nodes.description: Guidelines for transferring data to third parties

nodes.name: Data Retention Policy
nodes.description: Defines retention periods and deletion procedures

nodes.name: Grievance Redressal Policy
nodes.description: Process for handling data principal grievances

nodes.name: Data Access Policy
nodes.description: Controls for accessing personal data by authorized personnel

nodes.name: Children Data Policy
nodes.description: Special protections for children under 18 years

nodes.name: Audit and Monitoring Policy
nodes.description: Framework for internal and external audits

nodes.name: Third Party Policy
nodes.description: Requirements for data processors and sub-processors

nodes.name: AES-256 Encryption
nodes.description: Implement AES-256 for all stored data

nodes.name: TLS/SSL in Transit
nodes.description: Enforce TLS 1.2+ for data transmission

nodes.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
nodes.description: Require MFA for all system access

nodes.name: Role-Based Access Control
nodes.description: Implement RBAC with principle of least privilege

nodes.name: Automated Audit Logging
nodes.description: Log all data access and modifications

nodes.name: Data Loss Prevention
nodes.description: Deploy DLP tools to prevent unauthorized exfiltration

nodes.name: SIEM Monitoring
nodes.description: Real-time monitoring and alerting

nodes.name: Data Protection Training
nodes.description: Annual mandatory training for all staff

nodes.name: Background Screening
nodes.description: Background checks for data-handling staff

nodes.name: Confidentiality Agreements
nodes.description: NDAs for all staff and contractors

nodes.name: Consent Management System
nodes.description: Automated consent tracking system

nodes.name: Grievance Tracking System
nodes.description: Manage grievance resolution process

nodes.name: Incident Response Plan
nodes.description: Documented breach response procedures

nodes.name: DPIA Assessment Tool
nodes.description: Automated DPIA evaluation system

nodes.name: Data Retention Management
nodes.description: Automated data deletion based on retention periods

nodes.name: Consent Management System
nodes.description: Centralized platform for managing consent collection and revocation

nodes.name: DPIA Assessment Platform
nodes.description: Automated DPIA assessment and reporting tool

nodes.name: Grievance Management Portal
nodes.description: Portal for data principals to lodge grievances

nodes.name: Audit Logging System
nodes.description: Centralized audit log aggregation and analysis

nodes.name: Identity and Access Management
nodes.description: Central authentication and authorization system

nodes.name: Data Vault/Repository
nodes.description: Encrypted database for storing personal data

nodes.name: Backup and Recovery System
nodes.description: Backup and disaster recovery infrastructure

nodes.name: Data Loss Prevention Suite
nodes.description: Tools for preventing unauthorized data exfiltration

nodes.name: Security Information Event Management
nodes.description: Real-time security monitoring and alerting

nodes.name: Data Access API
nodes.description: APIs for authorized access to personal data

nodes.name: Consent Collection
nodes.description: Collect and record consent from data principals

nodes.name: Breach Notification
nodes.description: Notify authority and data principals of breaches

nodes.name: Grievance Resolution
nodes.description: Receive, track, and resolve grievances

nodes.name: Data Access Request
nodes.description: Process data principal access requests

nodes.name: Data Erasure
nodes.description: Process and execute data erasure requests

nodes.name: Data Correction
nodes.description: Process and execute data correction requests

nodes.name: Data Transfer
nodes.description: Transfer personal data to third parties with consent

nodes.name: Internal Audit
nodes.description: Conduct compliance audits and assessments

nodes.name: Compliance Training
nodes.description: Deliver data protection training to staff

nodes.name: DPIA Execution
nodes.description: Conduct data protection impact assessments

nodes.name: Warning Notice
nodes.description: Initial warning to non-compliant fiduciary

nodes.name: Suspension Order
nodes.description: Suspension of data processing activities

nodes.name: Cease Processing Order
nodes.description: Order to cease processing immediately

nodes.name: Fine - Low Tier
nodes.description: Monetary penalty up to ₹5 crores

nodes.name: Fine - High Tier
nodes.description: Monetary penalty up to ₹10 crores

nodes.name: Data Destruction Order
nodes.description: Order to destroy collected personal data

nodes.name: Compliance Audit Order
nodes.description: Mandatory compliance audit at fiduciary expense

nodes.name: Transfer Barrier
nodes.description: Prohibition on data transfers to third parties

nodes.name: Compensation Order
nodes.description: Order to pay compensation to data principal

nodes.name: Appeal Rejection
nodes.description: Rejection of appeal against penalty

nodes.name: Criminal Referral
nodes.description: Referral for criminal prosecution

nodes.name: Public Notice
nodes.description: Publication of enforcement action in public domain
